description: This tables stores the notifications sent for estimate records.

columns.name: ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the patient estimate record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NOTIF_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the UTC instant when the notification was sent for this estimate.

columns.name: NOTIF_HX_DESTTYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of notification that was sent (e.g. Email/SMS).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Email


SMS


Push

columns.name: NOTIF_DEST
columns.description: The destination (email or phone number) to which an estimate notification was sent.
